The battle for Pokrovsk enters its final phase
subhead: Russian infantry are advancing inside the city, one of the last major urban centers in the Donetsk region still under Kyiv's control. Moscow's shift in tactics – focusing on destroying Ukrainian logistics – has paid off after six months.

title: In Latvia, public mobilization continues to grow in support of the Istanbul Convention for preventing violence against women
subhead: Latvian lawmakers voted on October 30 to withdraw from the Istanbul Convention. Since then, the president has called for a review of the bill, as protests are planned across the country on Thursday.

subhead: The French designer and the Parisian fashion house ended their partnership on Wednesday after several months of speculation.

subhead: This ethnic and religious minority now numbers just 4,000 members and faces intrusive tourism and the degradation of their environment, which is essential to their survival.

title: Shein attracts a wide customer base in France, despite controversy
subhead: The Chinese online platform has become the fifth-largest clothing retailer in France. Its ultra-low prices and constantly updated wide selection of styles and sizes have won over consumers.
